mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT a.admin_num, n.notice_num, n.notice_title, n.notice_date, n.notice_view FROM tbl_admin a JOIN tbl_notice n ON a.admin_num = n.admin_num ORDER BY n.notice_date DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

select a.admin_num, a.admin_id, n.notice_num, n.notice_title , n.notice_content , n.notice_date , n.notice_view from tbl_admin a join tbl_notice n on notice_num = #{noticeNum} and a.admin_num = n.admin_num

SELECT n.notice_num, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_date, n.notice_view, a.admin_num, a.admin_id FROM tbl_notice n JOIN tbl_admin a ON n.admin_num = a.admin_num WHERE n.notice_num = #{noticeNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set notice_view = notice_view + 1 where notice_num = #{noticeNum}
